title:
25i01.  Institutions primarily engaged in the care of the sick, the
aged, the mentally ill or defective residing on the premises defined.
text:
FOH 12f02 contains the definition of such institutions. This definition
shall be used for purposes of Sec 13(b)(8), 2nd part, prior to 5/1/74 and Sec
7(j) beginning 5/1/74.
html: FOH 12f02 contains the definition of such institutions. This definition shall be used for purposes of Sec 13(b)(8), 2nd part, prior to 5/1/74 and Sec 7(j) beginning 5/1/74.
